title: Story behind the tap
creator_credit: Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works and Richard C. Seeger
brief_description: Covers the water supply system of Melbourne from three main catchment areas. Shows water from the catchments supplying storages, then to the suburban distribution reservoirs and finally mains distribution. The various forms of maintenance of the system, purification, and research work on supply problems to an ever-growing city are also presented.
